title: Ticket #7736: Remove 1-second sleep in file xfer when upload_changed_files is true
description: In our FileTransfer object, the DownloadFiles() method sleeps for 1 second whenever upload_changed_files is True. This was done because older POSIX APIs only provided 1 second resolution for changed time of files. The modern APIs have nanosecond resolution, so we should remove this sleep and update our time checks to use newer methods.
remarks:
2020-Dec-04 11:24:08 by coatsworth:
I'm abandoning this ticket; it's a good idea in theory, but the practicalities of supporting different time resolutions in various Windows and POSIX file systems make it impractical to implement.
